output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows a user to set the allowance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Predictable buy function allows attackers to manipulate the contract's balance.
sell function allows attackers to manipulate the contract's balance due to incorrect access control.
transfer function allows attackers to manipulate the contract's balance due to incorrect access control.
